title: Part A
stimulusHtml: Select a point value to view scoring criteria, solutions, and/or examples and to score the response.
descriptions:
The response does not include any of the following:

  • Annelida lacks a mantle (while mollusks have a mantle).

  • Annelida lacks a muscular foot (while mollusks have a muscular foot).

  • Annelida lacks a radula (while mollusks have a radula).
The response includes one of the following:

title: Part B
stimulusHtml: Select a point value to view scoring criteria, solutions, and/or examples and to score the response.
descriptions:
The response does not include the following:

  • This character arose independently (in each lineage) because of similar environmental selective pressures/convergent evolution.

  • Individuals in each of the two lineages developed this character due to (one or more) mutations, then the character was favored by selective pressures/because of convergent evolution.
The response includes one of the following:

title: Part C
stimulusHtml: Select a point value to view scoring criteria, solutions, and/or examples and to score the response.

title: Part D
stimulusHtml: Select a point value to view scoring criteria, solutions, and/or examples and to score the response.
descriptions:
The response does not include the following:

  • Changes in the genome lead to reproductive isolation between the populations.

  • Random mutations occurred in organisms that were exposed to different selective pressures, and the mutations that provided advantageous traits in different environments became fixed.
The response is one of the following:
